name: Shiver at the Peaks
description: <c=@flavor>"Are you crazy? It's colder than a lich's wit up there!"</c>
requirement:
Use /shiver in the highest parts of all the Shiverpeak Mountains.
<c=@reminder>Requires access to previous Living World episodes to complete.</c>
locked_text: Learn the /shiver emote from Icebrood Saga Episode 2, "Shadow in the Ice."
